contentrichtext.text: '''Penguin Island''' may refer to: ==Book== * [[Penguin Island (novel)|''Penguin Island'' (novel)]], satirical novel ==Television== * [[Penguin Island (TV series)|''Penguin Island'' (TV series)]], a 6-part Australian natural history documentary miniseries about the life of the Little Penguin ==Islands== * [[Penguin Island (Western Australia)]], off Perth * [[Penguin Island (South Shetland Islands)]], Antarctica * [[Penguin Islands, Namibia]] * [[Penguin Island, New Zealand]], off [[D'Urville Island, New Zealand]] * Penguin Island, Newfoundland, now known as [[Funk Island]] * [[Penguin Island (Tasmania)]] * [[Penguin Islet (Tasmania)]] * Alternative name for the [[Afuera Islands]], Antarctica ==See also== * [[ÃŽle des Pingouins]], Crozet Archipelago, South Indian Ocean {{geodis}}
